Improve Efficiency and Simplify Visa Applications

Welcome to the Formally Browser Extension, your ultimate tool for simplifying and streamlining the visa application process. Whether you're an immigration lawyer managing multiple clients or an individual applicant looking to save time and reduce errors, our extension has you covered.

The visa application process can be time-consuming and prone to errors. Our browser extension is your key to boosting efficiency and reducing the risk of errors. Lawyers and clients alike can benefit from this time-saving feature.

This extension supports form-filling on the following websites: https://ceac.state.gov, https://flag.dol.gov, https://my.uscis.gov, and https://everify.uscis.gov.

Support

We value your feedback and are committed to improving the extension. If you encounter any issues or have suggestions for enhancements, please get in touch with us at [support@formally.com](mailto:support@formally.com). Together, we can make your visa application process smoother than ever before.
